name: AmbientmusicforGaming
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gaming music
des:
The playing sequence is designed in such a way, it will start with a calm sound on an odd number of plays and EDM sounds on an even number of plays.

you can always say next to skip the playing audio and satisfy with your desired audio by saying next / previous

The audio skill consists of audios. Namely:
Assassins Creed IV Black Flag Ambient SoundtrackRelaxing only
EDM
Assassins Creed Syndicate Victorian London On Foot 1 Hour Ambient Walk 
EDM
ASSASSINS CREED ODYSSEY Music Ambience Ocean View Assassins Creed Odyssey Soundtrack OST
EDM
Assassins Creed 2 Ambience Venice Rialto Bridge
EDM
Assassins Creed Ambient Music Mix AC1 AC Odyssey
EDM
Assassins Creed Revelations Ambient Mi OST
Assassins Creed Valhalla OST Ambient Music Mix Frozen Lands Official Game Soundtrack Music
Florence Assassins Creed Ambience 1 hour
Introspective Memories Assassins Creed Ambient Soundtrack Mix
Venice Assassins Creed II Ambience and Music 1 hour


You can play/pause/stop resume as like an audio player.

To start you can say, Alexa, open gaming music and it will prompt you whether you want to start, for that you can say, start or begin. The conversation for the first time user is :

User: Alexa, open gaming music.
Alexa: Welcome to gaming music. To start you can say start or begin.
User: begin
Alexa: Plays the audio.

For recurrent users,
User: Alexa, open gaming music
Alexa: Do you want to resume, say yes or no, you were listening to <title>
User: Yes
Alexa: <Plays the audio where you left off>

Thank you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
